name: dsbn
description: Design SVG By Numbers ( Use DBN language for SVG implement by TypeScript )

scripts.test: npm run compile && export TS_NODE_PROJECT=test && mocha
scripts.test-watch: npm run compile && export TS_NODE_PROJECT=test && mocha --watch
scripts.test-cov: npm run compile && export TS_NODE_PROJECT=test && istanbul cover _mocha && npm run test-cov-remap
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test

author: Yourtion Guo <yourtion@gmail.com>
